channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Monthly News - October 2024
item.description:
Microsoft Defender for Cloud Monthly news October 2024 Edition
This is our monthly "What's new" blog post, summarizing product updates and various new assets we released over the past month. In this edition, we are looking at all the goodness from September 2024.
Legend:
Product videos
Webcasts (recordings)
Docs on Microsoft
Blogs on Microsoft
GitHub
External content
Product improvements
Announcements
Microsoft Defender for Cloud
While FIM based on MDE is now Generally Available, Defender for Container extends coverage to include Docker Hub ...
